errors.error_description: The development dependencies are installed before the virtual environment is created and activated, which will install them globally instead of in the isolated environment.
correction_candidates: The command '. venv/bin/activate' should be the first command after 'cd py-evm'.
The command 'python -m pip install -e ".[dev]"' should be run after 'virtualenv -p python3 venv' and '. venv/bin/activate'.
Replace 'python -m pip install -e ".[dev]"' with 'pip install -r requirements-dev.txt' after activating the virtual environment.
The command 'python -m pip install -e ".[dev]"' should be moved to the very end of the script.
errors.golden_answer: The command 'python -m pip install -e ".[dev]"' should be run after 'virtualenv -p python3 venv' and '. venv/bin/activate'.
